hero.title: Convert Images
hero.subtitle: Convert PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF and more — directly in your browser. No upload, no signup, no watermark.

footer.privacyDesc: Your files never leave your browser. Zero server uploads.
footer.freeDesc: No limits, no credits, no hidden fees.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: Unlike CloudConvert and other online converters, your files are processed entirely in your browser. Nothing is uploaded to any server.

speed.title: Instant Conversion
speed.desc: No waiting in queue. No server processing time. Your files are converted the moment you click the button.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.desc: No credit system, no subscriptions, no hidden fees. Convert as many images as you want, whenever you want.

formats.title: All Popular Formats
formats.desc: Support for PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF, BMP and more. Perfect for web optimization, social media, and design work.

pricing.title: Go Pro
pricing.subtitle: Support development and unlock advanced features

free.title: Free
features: All formats (PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF, BMP)
